title: Black and Tan
description: Leon Black is a Harvard-educated scientist turned expert police detective. Tandoori Jones is a jive-talking, smooth-walking, typical Indian supercop who plays by his own rules: none. Together they are Black and Tan.
quote: It’s from a deli alright, New Delhi.
altHero: Leon and Tandoori flying through the air with a big cloud of smoke behind them
alt1: Leon looking into a microscope with calculations on a blackboard behind him
alt2: Tandoori pointing a gun with “Danger” signs behind him
alt3: Leon holding a plate of Indian food
